page.title: 12Shopping- Rotherham Centre
page.content: The Cascades is a new shopping centre. Most of these shops in the cascades have been open since November 1984 The Cascades is the town centre.It has twelve shops open,two have been let to an optician and the Halifax Building Society and there is another one but they do not know what its going to be. This Cascades Centre borders onto Frederick St, Howard St and Corporation St and it contains Superdrug, Connect, Yorkshire Bank, Lazer Records, Jeffersons Camera Shop, Smiths Dry Cleaners, Evans Clothes Shop, Graftons, Dixons, Mothercare, G.T. News and Champs Cafe. There is also an opening at the side which leads to a loading bay at the back.
